narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Arirang Adult Medical Day Care is a Custodial Care Facility provider based in Columbia, MD. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $29.0M in Medicaid payments across 342K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $29.0M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
